name: 韓秉軒
objective:
本課程主要探究虛擬實境與擴增實境應用中，佔有十分重要地位的 360度全景影像攝影及動態影像製作。包括 360度攝影原理介紹、器材入門、攝影練習、編輯工具介紹等等。
This course explore virtual reality and augmented reality applications, it occupies a very important position in the 360-degree panoramic image photography and motion picture production. Including 360-degree photography principle introduced, entry equipment, photographic practice, presentation editing tools and so on.
